title: when will the next 2 for 1 rune page sale occur?
body: i've missed the last time this deal was taking place and i was wondering when will the next one happen

replies.body: I don't really have information on sales or new content until it's announced or released.  I suggest bookmarking our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page to stay up to date on a rune page sale.  Hopefully it won't be too long!
Each new season, About 9 months from now.
At the beggining of the new season ;)
